example.eg: No, I have nothing in my pockets.
example.egtrans: 没有，我口袋里什么也没有。

example.eg: Nothing can stop me from getting what I want.
example.egtrans: 没有什么能阻止我获得自己想要的。

example.eg: My bank account was reduced to nothing after the last withdrawal.
example.egtrans: 自上次取钱之后，我的银行账户就没钱了。

example.eg: "What's wrong?" "Oh, it's nothing."

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不重要的事情, 无关紧要的事情, 没怎么

example.eg: You can eat two hot dogs?  That's nothing!  I can eat four at a time.
example.egtrans: 你能吃两个热狗？那算不了什么！我一次能吃四个。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 微不足道的，没什么了不起的

example.eg: Do you believe that the universe was made out of nothing?
Don't worry about what he says.  He's a nothing.
example.egtrans: 别在意他说的话。他谁也不是。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 无足轻重的人或事物，谁或什么也不是
孤注一掷, 不成功则成仁
孤注一掷, 宁为玉碎, 不为瓦全

example.eg: I hate soup, but it is better than nothing since I am hungry.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不在乎, 不以为意, 不顾

example.eg: He felt that all his efforts had come to nothing.
If they say it costs nothing, it must be a scam of some kind.
example.egtrans: 如果他们说这是完全免费的，那肯定是某种诈骗。

example.eg: Being helpful and friendly to people costs nothing.
How can you sit there and do nothing while your son sits in jail?
He has great ideas, but when it's time to act on them he's a do-nothing.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不采取行动的人, 光说不做的人, 只想不行动的人

dsense.name: double or quits, also UK: double or nothing

trans_examp.trans_cn: 要么双倍付钱，要么一笔勾销

example.eg: I won $100 in a double-or-nothing bet.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 要么赢双倍, 要么一笔勾销的

example.eg: When we were first married, we bought an old couch for next to nothing.  At a yard sale you can buy anything you want for next to nothing.
example.egtrans: 我们刚结婚的时候，几乎没花什么钱就买到了一张旧沙发。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 几乎不花钱, 很便宜

example.eg: Billy's helping old Mrs.Thomas with her yard work for nothing.
I put in all that effort for nothing!
The little boy came up from behind and hit me for nothing.
In my opinion, Jake is nothing but a lazy good-for-nothing.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 游手好闲的人, 二流子

example.eg: My brother's a good-for-nothing scrounger.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 堕懒无能的, 无用的

example.eg: My Dad thinks I wasted 4 years of college on a good-for-nothing Philosophy degree.
At first glance she seems to have nothing in common with her boyfriend.
Don't come in! I've got nothing on!
Richard is lovely, but he's got nothing on his brother.
The police can't arrest me. They've got nothing on me!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 无所事事, 无事可做

example.eg: You have nothing to lose by applying to the university.
Since Mark moved to London, I have heard nothing from him.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 什么也没听说, 没有…的消息

example.eg: It's a long flight, but if nothing else, you can finish reading that novel.
"What's the problem?" "Oh, it's nothing."
I know nothing about that.
I'm ashamed to say I know nothing of American literature.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 对…一无所知, 一点都不知道, 毫不明白

example.eg: It is often said that the Royal Family know nothing of real life.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 对…没有经验, 对…一无所知

example.eg: The sound of babies crying irritates me like nothing else.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 出类拔萃, 与众不同

example.eg: The train ride through the Swiss Alps was like nothing else.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 出类拔萃的, 与众不同的

example.eg: After paying that huge telephone bill, I have next to nothing left in the bank.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 无事生非, 小题大做, 几乎没有

example.eg: I've got nothing at all suitable to wear for the party!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 什么都没有，一无所有, 什么事都没有，没事

example.eg: I have nothing but admiration for people who can speak several languages.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 只不过, 只有, 无事可做

example.eg: When I'm in the mood for ice cream, nothing else will do.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 没有任何别的东西，别无他物, 没有别的事

example.eg: Nothing else but violin is needed to complete this orchestration.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 除了…就没有…, 只有…, 只是…

example.eg: Nothing in particular is needed to complete this decor.
Chicken tastes nothing like shrimp.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 与…完全不同, 和…丝毫不像

example.eg: There's nothing more the doctors can to do to help Jim.
Sympathy is nothing more than the understanding of someone else's feelings.
There is nothing much happening downtown today.
They thought we were coming for a visit, but we had planned nothing of the kind.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 绝不是那么回事，才不是呢

dsense.name: nothing of the sort
dsense.guideword: (not at all as described) (强调情况不同)

example.eg: I've done nothing of the sort!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 绝对不是这样的，绝对没有

example.eg: "I heard that you borrowed Jane's car without asking her." "Nothing of the sort!"

trans_examp.trans_cn: 绝没有这回事，才不是呢

example.eg: Nothing on earth can keep me from the man I love.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 非常难受, 非常糟糕

example.eg: Some Americans think government oversight of health care is nothing other than socialism.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 除…外没有, 不过, 仅仅

dsense.name: nothing less than [sth], nothing short of [sth]

example.eg: Nothing short of a full apology will mollify him.

dsense.name: nothing less than [sth], nothing short of [sth]

example.eg: His behaviour was nothing short of rude.
Nothing special happened that day.
The film was nothing special.

dsense.name: be nothing to do with [sb], have nothing to do with [sth]

example.eg: Stop listening in to our conversation; this is nothing to do with you.

dsense.name: be nothing to do with [sth/sb], have nothing to do with [sth/sb]

example.eg: You would think that volcanoes have nothing to do with the weather, but they do.  My bad mood today has nothing to do with the weather.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 与…没有关系, 与…不相干

example.eg: I'll have nothing to do with your plan to steal gold from Fort Knox.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不干涉..., 不插足..., 不插手...

example.eg: I've had nothing to do with my ex-husband since our divorce.
When the reporter asked about his alleged affair, he answered "I have nothing to say about that."
I enjoyed his last film, but this new one is nothing to write home about.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 平淡无奇, 一般般, 不足挂齿

example.eg: I will have nothing whatsoever to do with that boy, he's awful!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 没有什么, 无论什么也不能

example.eg: It's not a bad restaurant but it's nothing out of the ordinary.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 平平无奇, 不过尔尔

example.eg: A defendant has the right to say nothing in a court of law.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 什么也不说, 保持沉默

example.eg: She said nothing of her upcoming surgery for fear her family would worry.  You don't need to thank me - say nothing of it!
